website_summaries.verdict: Customers love this model for its smooth, comfortable operation, as well as its price.
pros: Ideal for vertical and overhead sanding applications
Runs smooth and quiet, with little vibration
Uses little air, but has a lot of power
cons: Some buyers report quality issues with this unit dying within a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Will tou refund my money on sanders that don't work
customer_reviews.text: Sanders worked great for 30 days, after that the steel fitting wore loose from the aluminum housing. Then after we re-threaded the female threads and got it working, it stop turning off. Contacted the insurance policy that I also bought from Amazon, but no results. I'm returning 3 of tbe 5 that aren't working. My advice is to buy Dewalt sanders. Just another for note, getting ready to order 6 dewalt Sanders to replace the 5 that I bought in September. I'm going to use these red one for target practice since the insurance I purchased doesn't help and no one will contact me Waist of money. Buy Dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Benito M. Loera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my air DA sander that I've had for decades. This one seemed like a good value. It operates very smoothly, and delivers more sanding with less air consumption than my old one. Time will tell, but it seems well made and I think it will hold up well. It came with a velcro pad, which is not specified anywhere in the description. I prefer a PSA pad, but they are easily enough changed over.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sander is good I probably would have went with a 6 inch pad instead of the 5 in I ended up purchasing a 6-inch pad at the local auto parts store because the 6-inch paper is cheaper. Also the air adjustment button is very touchy otherwise it seems like a very decent da sander.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me Al

customer_reviews.title: It Feels Gooooooood
customer_reviews.text: Ive had other air operated DA sanders & hate using them so i was skeptical about this one. Although much to my surprise this one feels great in the palm of my hand i sanded a whole bumper cover on the big nose of my Trans Am effortlessly and effectively. The DA actions of the sander are not extreme which makes it a much smoother experience. I love the little thing. Really changed my opinion on Pneumatic sanders. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: e-Rok

customer_reviews.title: No dust collector.
customer_reviews.text: This sander works well in our cabinetry shop for finish sanding. It sands flat and smooth and has lots of power. We have purchased two so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heather MK

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for it's intended purpose. Stays flat when sanding doesn't vibrate much on hand and sands well couldn't ask for anything more especially for the price. I use this in a wood shop and let others borrow it constantly I push it's limits and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Travis G.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one restoring an old El Camino, have two long throw D.A.s for body work, wanted this to cut and buff. It has held up to a week of non stop use. The air adjustment lever is located under it where my fingers try to hang out so it jumped wide open on me a couple times. That lever is poorly located and to touchy. Otherwise it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this DA for body work and it's an awesome little tool! A guy I work with has Dynabrades and wanted to check out my new DA...he loved this thing! He said it's got all the and stuff as the Dynabrade and that next time, he'll buy this one instead! The only flaw I found with this doesn't even matter...u can hear a slight squeak on the lever when u press it when it's not in use...lol...just buy this and you'll be glad that u did!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Could be a good tool
customer_reviews.text: The air adjustment is flimsy it moves on its own if you let off the trigger for an instant. It will go from barley moving to wide open and I never even touch the air controller. Could be a good tool but this makes it a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: this is great value for money. Works wonderfully and has more power than I expected. I havent used it much, but I plan to use it to sand all the paint off of an old pickup. I will update if there's any issues.
customer_reviews.author: ryan2727rr

customer_reviews.title: Good sander
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good sander overall for the price. The air adjusting knob moves a little too easily for Me and it’s also a bit heavy compared to some others but does what it’s intended to do
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Charles

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid and works good
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and solid. Works great. I’m a lefty, and the throttle lever underneath is touchy and I keep bumping it with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: William Warnke

customer_reviews.title: i really like this sander as it fits my hand very well
customer_reviews.text: it was shipped and delivered on time. i really like this sander as it fits my hand very well. i use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: carteid

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sand some butcher block counters. I've got about 3.5 hours on it so far, and I'm happy with the performance. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Neisen

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value buy.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well at safely power scrubbing my pool tile using a small air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: Decent da for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this da2 do some body work and sanding seems to be working pretty good so far no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: As a footnote to my original comment this product seems ...
customer_reviews.text: As a footnote to my original comment this product seems to break the Chuck off where the air connects this has happened to me on 3 different occasions and I just keep replacing the connection the end piece blew apart.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: After paying $250.00 sanders I found this one to be a good value for the price. I will watch the one issue that hopefully wont crop up,o ring going bad and causing sander to stay on full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell A. Galumbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It lasted almost three years with moderate use. Would be fantastic for a home workshop, but not in every day production use. But at this price, I'll buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked great for the one time I got to use it. It lasted for 30 minutes then just stopped. Put fun oil In hold down the handle let the oil get in there and it still broke. DONT BUY ITS THIS. P.O.S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: For a non name brand works good I added the oiler to mine to be safe
customer_reviews.author: kevin blaisdell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked this orbital sander until it stopped working. He only used it about 3 times before it quit working and it was a week outside of the return time so I can't exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Donahue

customer_reviews.title: The items came in good order, on time
customer_reviews.text: The items came in good order, on time, work well and acceptable price. They also came with an adapter which was a plus. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Huron Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day for work when I prep cars small and it feels right.
customer_reviews.author: dwight

customer_reviews.title: Received brand new in the box however dead on arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: Received brand new in the box however dead on arrival, I understand DO could happen but would happen to testing units before shipping them to customers?
customer_reviews.author: Nello T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DA for general use between automotive in the garage and the projects my Wife likes to do. It has been better than I’ve expected out of a “off brand” air tool. So far I’ve only sanded one old pick up truck and it’s been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Easy On The Hand
customer_reviews.text: Nice working unit. Read all the reviews & the one that said. "At least a 30 gal. tank." Well, 30 gal is just getting me through the small refinish job on my truck's hood. My beef if finding 80 & 120 hook & loop locally. Even here the 80 & 120 grit hook & loop weren't paired with this unit AT ALL, had to hunt for them. Why would anyone need adhesive backs for home work shops outside of large sanding wheels & other large tools? And why the heck are they still pushing common screws at us. If one isn't doing antique restorations why use a common screw for anything. Sorry mates, got carried away.
customer_reviews.author: Mattpaw

customer_reviews.title: ... not cost several hundred dollars but works just as good, it's not heavy and runs very smooth
customer_reviews.text: This sander does not cost several hundred dollars but works just as good, it's not heavy and runs very smooth. I use this everyday for my job and I am very happy with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and works great. I have used this for a few months now and am very impressed with this sander. other people I work with plan on ordering one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great with plenty of power to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works better than the high price ones I have so far
customer_reviews.text: It works better than the high price ones I have so far .Men in shop likes it better than the high price ones . Has more power and likes the way exhaust comes out .
customer_reviews.author: stan tucker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Second time I used it, the button got stuck and it doesnt turn off. Disappointed and want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Beul

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great , I have a small shop and it handles everything.
customer_reviews.author: 1611 KJV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pneumatic sander
customer_reviews.text: I use this to polish surfaces before applying paint and used it with 6in pad also ok, although directions say no, quiet and low vibration. Very happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Frutiz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use my DA everyday, all day. I bought one 2 years ago and it has started to lock up on me but I oil it once in awhile and that fixes the problem for awhile. Ordered another one tho. Happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sander for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sander works as good as a 3m.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poor made.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you connect the air hose it spins by it self. Cheap and poor made.
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of using it
customer_reviews.text: So far its my go to palm sander, I like the feel of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I like this palm sander!
customer_reviews.text: Very good palm sander. Good power, low air consumption, smooth. I used it to polish out the paint on my wife's car. No bog, quick action. Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: ELJ_62

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice sander that is easy to handle and works great. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melia C.

customer_reviews.title: It is sized right for comfortable use and I love it
customer_reviews.text: So far this item has worked extremely well. It is sized right for comfortable use and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Low vibration makes it easy to use for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality, best sander in my shop. I work in a body shop.
customer_reviews.author: RubenMcCrory

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, the air pressure adjustment isn't as sensitive as I hoped but overall a very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great value
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for 2 weeks and used it everyday. Seems like a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, didn't use a lot of air pressure, small and compact... Very nice☺
customer_reviews.author: hipstre1

customer_reviews.title: Service
customer_reviews.text: Very Bad experience I Buy 2 first was ok Then I Buy more 2 and any of those Don't Work None ( too bad experience )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: R
customer_reviews.text: Nice variable speed adjustment, good for sanding in prep for paint
customer_reviews.author: jane henrickson

customer_reviews.title: palm sander
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Also wet sanding too. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: jeff tousley

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: after use of 3days, chuck start to making weird sound and stopped
customer_reviews.author: sangdon

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting bearings
customer_reviews.text: Finish Carpentry Commercial Construction great tool to have in your supplies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works good. The only drawback is it has a loud ...
customer_reviews.text: It works good. The only drawback is it has a loud whiny noise. Too annoying to work with it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Came dead on arrival, I have a 60 gal 5hp compressor and run some decent air tools including another DA, air file sander etc. I took a chance with an "off brand". Just wanted to not have to switch between 5" and 6" sanding discs. Seems like a decent quality tool just did not work when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Why Not Five Stars.....
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, smooth, operates under 100 psi, reason for four stars and not five.... sanding discs are not as easy to locate to fit sanding pad locally. I have finally located pads from 100 grit all way up to 2000 grit but many vendors were used to accummulate a wide variation of sanding discs... other size pads appear to be easier to locate pads. The sander will handle other pads which might make their options available... I think the supplier should provide two options for sanding pads. The unit works great and lives up to other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent tool I’ve used it a few times works good
customer_reviews.author: frank logan

customer_reviews.title: worth the money and so much more
customer_reviews.text: I sand and grind corion countertops for my career, I bought this sander and glued it to make a grinder. It is an awesomly fast little guy. Not heavy, and is powerful. Definitely has some ass to it. We have a bbigair compressor. I do not know how well it would work with a smaller at home compressor.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent sander, but make sure your compressor is up to the task. its very comfortable and handles nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered stick it not hook it I don't want to cheat yall on the price I need stick it
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great for check sanding wood parts!
customer_reviews.text: We were nervous about buying these for our factory so I just got 2 and we are so pleased with them! I just ordered more for sanding wood and the employees love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Awful experience. First, the shipping was far longer than i expected. I had no idea it was shipping from around the world. Secondly, the palm sander is awful quality... DO NOT BUY THIS. During the very first few minutes of use I couldn't shut it off. Apparently the valve inside is broken and stuck in the open position. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Professional Air Random Orbital Palm Sander, Dual Action Pneumatic Sander, Low Vibration, Heavy Duty
product_meta.description:
Size:5 inchNew version, high strength, wear resistant, long service life

Product Description:

Air Random Orbital Sander 
It is made of a composite plastic body and is pretty light weight.
It is best used for all kinds of metal products, polishing processing of residual after welding slag, weld and rust. 
Make sure you use the lubricating oil that comes with this for best performance.

Specifications:
Air Inlet:1/4"
Air Pressure: 90 PSI
hook and loop sanding pad:5"
Average air consumption: 10.5 CFM
Free speed: 12,000 RPM

Features:
Constructed with heat treated steel components for long life
Comfort Platform provides additional hand and wrist support.
Great sander, light weight, inexpensive, works great
feature_bullets: New version, high strength, wear resistant, long service life
Air Inlet:1/4", hook and loop sanding pad:5", Free speed: 12,000 revolutions per minute
Rear exhaust. Built-in regulator for speed control
Lighter air-motor assembly, ideal for vertical and overhead sanding applications
Average air consumption: 10.5 CFM;Air Pressure: 90 PSI

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
